GenerateOnlyActorsInRadius: If true, this will only returns actors of the specified class within the SearchRadius of the SearchCenter context.  If false, it will return ALL actors of the specified class in the world.
SearchRadius:
Max distance of path between point and context.  NOTE: Zero and negative values will never return any results if
UseRadius is true.  "Within" requires Distance < Radius.  Actors ON the circle (Distance == Radius) are excluded.
